name: Alice
description: A driven project manager who thrives on structure and getting things done. She's the unofficial leader of the office.
backstory: Alice grew up organizing neighborhood events as a kid. She studied business management and has always been the person people turn to when things need to get done.
goals: Keep the team productive and on track
Maintain a good working relationship with everyone
quirks: Drinks exactly 3 cups of coffee per day
speech_style: Direct and professional but warm. Uses phrases like 'let's focus up' and 'sounds like a plan'. Occasionally makes dry jokes.
